attributes.action: Teach British empire history in schools.
attributes.background: I believe it's time Britain faced up to its history.

rejection.details:
We understand that you're concerned about teaching the history of the British Empire, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do.

The British Empire is taught in history lessons in schools as part of the National Curriculum. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/national-curriculum-in-england-history-programmes-of-study/national-curriculum-in-england-history-programmes-of-study

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do. For example, a petition calling for a particular aspect of the history of the British Empire to be included in the National Curriculum.
